Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<Message>
public class Controller extends Object implements Observer<Message>
The calss controller represent the controller of the game in the MVC patter and permit the implementation of the Observer pattern

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(Message message)
      This method is the override of the update method of the Observer pattern when the controller is notified, this method is called
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer<Message>
      Parameters:
      message - is the message that will be executed by the gameHandler

    • disconnectedPlayer

      public void disconnectedPlayer(String nickname)
      This method is called when a player leave the game, reports to all the players to disconnect
